summary: This is an old talking point, the number steadily decreased until it reached zero on 2017-08-23.

statements.quote: Obamacare is not working. You just described your premium increases, your deductible increases. A third of the counties in Wisconsin are down to one insurer right here. We've got dozens of counties around America that have zero insurers left.

name: dozens of counties will have zero Obamacare insurers in 2018
